short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the word Pokemon from all web pages and replaces it with a random word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PokeDemon replaces all instances of the word Pokemon in your browser to a random other game. If you're tired of hearing the world go crazy about Pokemon then this is the extension for you.
